intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Penis fillers are a non-surgical cosmetic procedure, utilizing FDA-approved hyaluronic acid dermal filler, to augment the girth or thickness for satisfactory penis enlargement results at our aesthetic clinic. Both the shaft and the head of the penis can be treated with filler for penile girth enhancement. Penis injections for growth do not change the length of the penis while erect but do prevent full retraction of the penis when flaccid, so patients look longer when flaccid. This procedure for penis growth has no effect (both positive and negative) on erectile performance. This filler treatment is solely for aesthetic purposes. Lushful’s penis filler offers a variety of benefits to enhance sexual experience and confidence:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Longer length when flaccid","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Increased girth when flaccid and erect","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No effect on erectile function","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Increased confidence in the bedroom","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

Penis growth injections require several syringes to obtain the desired result with minimal downtime. Most patients start with 10-15 syringes for their initial treatment. The penis filler results include a longer appearance when flaccid, increased girth in both flaccid and erect states, and a boost in confidence without impacting erectile function. Please note, to view the penis enlargement before and after images requires providing your name and email, and verification that you are 18 years or older. faqRef.question: Is this better than PRP hair restoration and PRF hair restoration?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Yes, because TED hair restoration infuses a topical peptide and growth factor serum that is specifically designed to stimulate hair growth and help promote a healthy scalp. While PRP and PRF do contain growth factors, the med spa patient is limited by what their own body is able to create and if they are already experiencing hair loss and hair thinning then it’s likely their body is not producing enough of these hair growth factors. TED hair treatment for hair loss infuses this hair growth factor and peptide serum directly into the dermis to stimulate hair rejuvenation at the follicle.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How many treatments do I need?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"It’s recommended patients start with a series of 3 treatments with the hair restoration machine with the treatment schedule being 1 treatment per month. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How do I maintain my results of the ultrasound for hair growth?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"After patients complete their initial 3 TED hair restoration treatment series they should plan to return for 2-3 treatments per year to continue to improve on their initial results and maintain the results they have attained. It’s highly encouraged that patients of the Alma TED treatment continue other topical hair loss treatments such as topical finasteride and/or topical minoxidil, along with Nutrafol supplements. Hair restoration is best accomplished with a multimodality treatment approach. TED hair restoration is the key component of this treatment plan, but other hair rejuvenation therapies should be continued. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

Patients experiencing male pattern baldness, female hair loss, traction alopecia, stress-related hair loss, age-related hair loss, and more can all benefit from the TED hair treatment. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

faqRef.question: What should I expect with Alma TED?

During your treatment our Medical Aesthetician will evaluate your scalp, hair density, and hair quality to discuss the treatment approach tailored to your specific needs. You’ll notice improvements within one month of each treatment, but a series of treatments for hair loss in conjunction with topical medication and Nutrafol vitamins will aid in delivering optimal results that can be maintained. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Is the Alma TED treatment painful?

answer.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No, the Alma TED hair treatment is actually quite comfortable and soothing for many patients. Patients should expect to feel a warm sensation from the device and a mild vibration sensation that also creates a ringing sound through the course of treatment, but there is no pain experienced. No needles and no anesthesia are required for TED hair restoration treatments. There is no trauma or discomfort at the scalp during the treatment or post-treatment. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\n\n","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

faqRef.question: How soon will I see results from Alma TED?

answer.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"You can expect to see results 1 month after each TED hair restoration treatment, but patients are highly encouraged to complete the 3 treatment series and then plan for 2-3 treatments a year to continue to improve and maintain their ultrasound hair growth results.  ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\n\n","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

faqRef.question: Does Alma TED hair restoration regrow new hair follicles?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Yes. By delivering low-frequency “ultrasonic” acoustic waves and air pressure, the TED Hair restoration device infuses the peptide growth factor serum deep into the dermis to stimulate new hair follicle growth. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\n\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Does the Alma TED Hair restoration device replace a hair transplant?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"No. The only way to restore hair growth to a severely depleted scalp is through hair transplantation. However, TED hair treatment can be used in conjunction with hair transplants to help slow, stop, and reverse the progression of hair loss in both transplanted and non-transplanted areas. TED hair restoration would replace the need for the typical PRP hair restoration or PRF hair restoration required after a hair transplant. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How can sound waves help hair growth?

answer.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"TED hair restoration utilizes low-frequency “ultrasonic” acoustic sound waves and air pressure to drive topical growth factors and peptides specifically created to encourage hair growth deep into the skin through a process called acoustic cavitation. The utilization of sound waves to increase the penetration of topical treatments is called sonophoresis or phonophoresis. When assessing the anatomy of the scalp we see the stratum corneum is the outermost layer of the epidermis, composed primarily of dead cells and lipids, which form the primary barrier between the body and the environment around us. The stratum corneum has a layered brick-like structure to it, which blocks the penetration of large molecules and moisture. The corneocytes are the cellular “bricks” that are fused together with lipids, creating the outermost barrier. TED hair restoration utilizes its ultrasonic hair growth sound waves at a very specific vibration or frequency to cause tiny, transient gaseous bubbles within the stratum corneum to rapidly expand and collapse, which then disorganizes the lipid bilayer and temporarily increases the permeability of the topical hair growth factor and peptide complex serum. This is the process of Alma TED hair restoration device or “TransEpidermal Delivery,” which creates a push-and-pull effect to deliver the growth factor and peptide serum complex for hair rejuvenation to reach the hair follicles located below the stratum corneum.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Scrotum enlargement is a non-invasive procedure accomplished by injecting a thin hyaluronic acid filler into the dermal layer of the scrotum, increasing the size and volume of the scrotum. This makes both the scrotum and testicles appear larger and fuller. Scrotum enhancement results from an aesthetic clinic slowly fade away over approximately 2-3 years, depending on the number of scrotal enhancement injections used.  ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The hyaluronic acid filler we use in our scrotum injections is safe, as the body naturally produces it in areas such as the eyes, skin, and joints. This creates a situation conducive to collagen production.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

subheadingTwo: How does Penis Filler Revision work?

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"During a penis filler revision, we may partially or fully dissolve existing filler to correct lumps, bumps, and irregularities that compromise your penis filler results. In some instances of botched penis filler, dissolving the girth enhancement is not necessary. The exact process to correct botched penis filler results will be determined through a consultation to decide if one or two appointments at our aesthetic clinic are necessary before moving forward with penile girth enhancement corrections. In some cases we may be able to dissolve some irregularities and fill around them within one visit. In more serious cases of fillers with complications, one or more full dissolving sessions may be required before performing our signature girth enhancement treatment.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Our technique utilizes a strategic blend of hyaluronic acid penis fillers that are safely injected along the sides of the penis to create a more girthy penis and obtain the desired result with minimal downtime. Most patients start with 10-15 syringes for initial penis enlargement results. The longer a patient’s penis is, the more penis filler shots they will require to make a visual impact.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We are often sought out by patients nationwide seeking revision after unsatisfactory penile girth enhancements performed elsewhere. Chris Bustamante, DNP, NP-C, Aesthetic Nurse Practitioner aka InjectorChris is the leading expert in Penis Filler and Penis Filler revision work to help patients achieve optimal, natural-looking results and correction complications such as lumps/bumps, asymmetry, and Penis Filler migration issues. His technique for penis filler revision utilizes a customized approach of potential micro dissolving and refilling to place filler strategically to deliver the gold standard in Girth Enhancement with Penis Filler. And unlike most providers, Chris Bustamante, DNP, NP-C has extensive experience working with uncircumcised penises.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

faqRef.question: Who is a candidate for Penis Filler revision?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The optimal candidate for penis enlargement revision is someone who has been treated with a Hyaluronic Acid based filler and is looking to achieve a better aesthetic outcome. You can call your last provider to find out what penis filler they used. If a calcium-based filler such as Radiesse were used, we may be able to make some corrections. Patients who have been treated with BellaFill® cannot have this filler dissolved, as it’s permanent. However, we can help to “conceal” penis filler irregularities from BellaFill® by strategically filling around the poorly placed filler.\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Who is NOT a candidate for Penis Filler revision?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Patients who have been treated with silicone are NOT candidates for penis filler revisions, unfortunately. Permanent solutions like these are unable to be corrected. We advise you to speak with your last provider or a plastic surgeon about surgical removal of these fillers.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: What is the average recovery associated with penis filler dissolving?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Most patients should expect a few days of mild tenderness. Moderate swelling should be expected for 72 hours and then potential mild swelling may linger for two weeks depending on the individual. Strenuous activity and sexual activity should be limited for 24 hours after penile filler revision has been applied.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\n\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Are there side effects to girth enhancement with penis filler?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"When seeing an expert like Chris Bustamante, DNP, NP-C, penis filler is a treatment with highly predictable outcomes. Bruising and swelling are common side effects and therefore patients should plan for a reasonable amount of visual downtime. Other potential side effects are more rare but can occur such as: bumps/lumps, skin irregularities, poor placement, migration of filler, and tissue inflammation are not common, but are important to take into account. Potential infection must be noted with all penis filler treatments, but is not common when performed by a well trained medical provider. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: What can someone expect from the results of a penis enlargement revision procedure?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Patients can expect a more even and optimal result then what they initially presented with after receiving filler with complications. Our goal is to correct lumps/bumps, migration issues and make sure the penis filler looks symmetrical and smooth. The results should appear natural, yet impactful.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: What should be expected after Penis Filler dissolving?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Hyaluronidase is an enzyme utilized to dissolve hyaluronic acid based dermal filler. The dissolver will be mixed with lidocaine so the procedure is comfortable. There will be swelling present after your penis filler revision. Some small bruises may also occur after penis filler dissolves. Bruising and swelling typically take 1-2 weeks to fully settle. But the area will progressively improve day by day. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: What are potential side effects of Penis Filler dissolving?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Bruising and swelling are possible side effects of penis filler dissolving. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Do you have to be circumcised to have the Penis Enlargement revision procedure?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"No, both circumcised and uncircumcised penises can be treated with penis filler. Chris Bustamante, DNP is known for his expertise in treating uncircumcised patients and has a lot of experience revising poorly done penis filler. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Are there any side effects to loss of sensitivity, erection, or semen quality affecting pregnancy?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Penis filler and Penis Filler dissolving have no effects on sensitivity or erection quality. There are no studies on semen quality post-penis filler or after the use of hyularonidase in the penis, though it seems unlikely that modifying the penis has any impact on testicular function.\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Who Performs Penis Filler Procedures?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A range of medical professionals, from Nurse Practitioners, Physicians and PAs can legally perform penis filler. However, a medical provider needs to perform penis girth enlargement procedures multiple times a day to become proficient in this complicated procedure. While it may seem that a Urologist may be a penis filler expert; penis filler is actually not taught in Urology residencies or medical school, so most Urologists  do not receive any formal training in girth enhancement. It is recommended to seek out someone who specializes in non surgical sexual enhancement procedures, such as penis filler, for a living and does hundreds of these procedures a year, like Chris Bustamante, DNP, NP-C. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: What Are Proper Post-Care Instructions?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Wearing a “sleeve” to keep your extended after penis filler seems to be a popular post-care instruction now provided by larger marketing organizations that promote penis filler. Please know that this is NOT proper post-care and WILL likely contribute to further deformation of the penis filler as it heals. Leading to irregular shapes, lumps, and bumps. When working with Chris Bustamante, DNP, NP-C, the leading Penis Filler expert, he will provide you with the proper post-care required to achieve the most optimal results of penis filler revisions to protect your investment.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Why Does Filler Consistency Matter?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Girth Enhancement is not just a medical procedure, it’s a precise art form. Therefore, it’s essential that your medical provider utilizes the highest quality FDA-approved fillers. Here at Lushful Aesthetics, Chris Bustamante, DNP, NP-C , trusted expert in Penis Filler understands that different fillers have various consistencies and should be blended to create the perfect viscosity for optimal outcomes that leave him and his patients satisfied with the results of their penis filler revisions. This is why Chris will utilize 2-3 different fillers during each case to create the highest quality result. It’s important to note, there is no dermal filler that is FDA-approved to be utilized in the penis. But these fillers are FDA approved for various areas of the face. Utilizing dermal filler in the penis is always considered an off-label treatment.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Can filler be removed if placed incorrectly months or even years ago?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Yes. If hyaluronic acid (HA) filler was used—even if injected a long time ago—it can typically be dissolved using hyaluronidase, the same enzyme used for fresh revisions. However, if you want a safer correction of botched penile filler, a review by a specialist is essential for an accurate assessment.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Can I combine filler correction with other treatments (e.g. ShowTox®) at the same appointment?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Generally, combining treatments like Penis Filler correction and ShowTox® (penile Botox) is not recommended during the same session. Schedule any additional enhancements at a follow-up to allow proper healing and optimal results.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How will correction procedures affect my sensitivity or sexual function long-term?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Current evidence indicates that non-surgical enhancement revisions have no sustained impact on sensitivity, erection quality, or sexual function from HA filler or the dissolving enzyme. While long-term data on semen quality are limited, there’s no indication of adverse effects.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: What happens to the filler after the dissolving injection?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Once hyaluronidase is administered into either the head or the shaft of the penis, it begins dissolving the hyaluronic acid filler almost immediately. Visual changes can be noticeable in the hours or days following the procedure, though full settling and healing usually take up to two weeks. With some HA fillers, multiple dissolving sessions may be required to fully dissolve the filler.  ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Is follow-up required after undergoing a filler revision?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Yes, most patients benefit from at least one follow-up visit, often scheduled 3–4 weeks post-procedure, to ensure proper settling and to make adjustments if needed. This follow-up with InjectorChris helps confirm symmetry, smoothness, and patient satisfaction from their girth enhancement correction.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Do revision procedures cost the same as initial filler treatments?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Costs may vary depending on the complexity of the case, the amount of filler to dissolve, and any corrective work required. Revisions often involve both dissolving and refilling, which may increase costs. Our team will work with you to provide you with an estimate based on the assessment.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: After the Penis Filler dissolves, how long should I wait before deciding on re-filling?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Following filler removal, allow your tissue to fully heal—usually 1 to 2 weeks—before considering re-filling. This ensures we can accurately assess your baseline and plan for optimal placement.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Will dissolving filler cause lumps or volume loss that can’t be corrected?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Dissolving HA filler does not lead to lumps or permanent volume loss. The filler dissolves evenly, and any remaining irregularities can be addressed with skillful reapplication of penis filler.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

@graph.name: Penis Filler Revision
@graph.followup: Patients may experience mild swelling, bruising, or tenderness at the injection sites, which typically resolve within a few days. It is recommended to avoid sexual activity for 1–2 weeks post-treatment.
@graph.description: Penis Filler Revision is a non-surgical procedure designed to address and correct unsatisfactory results from previous penile filler treatments. Whether due to uneven distribution, migration of filler, or aesthetic concerns, this procedure aims to restore a natural and desired appearance using FDA-approved hyaluronic acid-based fillers.
@graph.howPerformed: The procedure involves assessing the existing filler and determining the best approach to achieve optimal results. This may include dissolving portions of the filler using hyaluronidase enzyme injections or adding additional filler to achieve symmetry and desired aesthetics. The process is performed under local anesthesia, ensuring patient comfort throughout.

beforeAfterServiceDescription: Check out the remarkable transformations we’ve helped patients make in our non surgical BBL before and after video. Our Instant BBL procedure offers a significant butt lift providing an immediate increase in volume and a more defined profile without the need for surgery. The liquid butt lift before and after video demonstrates the benefits of a non surgical BBL, featuring a lifted appearance, overall size increase, and the smoothing out of asymmetries and cellulite. The before and after video also showcase how Lushful’s instant lift can be an alternative to hip dip filler with a seamless transition from butt to legs, ensuring a natural and enhanced silhouette.

faqRef.question: How long do the results from a hyperdilute Radiesse non-Surgical BBL last?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Med spa results from the Lushful Instant BBL utilizing hyperdilute Radiesse last several years. The liquid filler component of Lushful Aesthetic’s butt lift without implants treatment lasts around 3 years, while the new collagen created by your own body from the Radiesse’s biostimulatory effect can last around 5 years.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Can Lushful Instant BBL filler be dissolved?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"No. Radiesse is not a hyaluronic acid-based filler, and therefore cannot be dissolved. However, the results and BBL recovery time from this procedure are quick, natural, safe, and effective. While temporary fillers for women and men’s BBLs like hyaluronic acid-based fillers only last 1-2 years, hyperdilute Radiesse BBL filler lasts 3 years and stimulates the body's production of collagen which can last up to 5 years.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How long does it take for filler to settle after a non-invasive Brazilian butt lift?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Hyperdilute Radiesse typically takes at least 2 weeks to settle, but based on individual treatment, final Hyperdilute Radiesse BBL results may take a month to settle without any residual swelling.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Will my butt look lumpy after a non-surgical Brazilian butt lift?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"After the non surgical BBL treatment there is a possibility of swelling. But as swelling begins to subside, the butt will even and smooth out. After 2 weeks your Lushful Instant BBL will be settled and look lush and plump.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How do I know how many syringes I need for my NYC Brazilian Butt Lift?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The results of your hyperdilute radiesse BBL are based on your goals and unique anatomy. Most patients start with 40-60 syringes for their initial non surgical butt lift treatment. It's the appropriate amount to see a difference where you can appreciate your investment. 20-30 syringes are usually only appropriate for patients looking to correct a small asymmetry or make a minor enhancement. For people with larger butts or those looking for a more modest gain in volume, 70-80 syringes is best for optimal results for a proper butt lift without implants. Dr. Bustamante will help you determine the best option for you at your appointment based on your goals and budget.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\n\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Can men get a BBL?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Yes! The Lushful Instant BBL is for men or anyone looking to enhance the volume and overall appearance of their butt with booty lift injections. As a leading medspa for men in NYC, all of our services, from sexual enhancements to facial aesthetic services, are available for men.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: What are the side effects of a non-surgical BBL with hyperdilute Radiesse for buttocks?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Mild soreness for 3-7 days can be expected after the initial non-surgical butt lift treatment. There is rarely bruising, but if bruising does occur it is usually mild and self resolves in about a week after the final instant BBL procedure.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Are there any differences between men’s BBL vs. women’s BBL?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The only difference would be the Hyperdilute Radiesse BBL results the patient is trying to achieve. Typically men want more of a “soccer butt” that has more projection to appear muscular and tight. While women will typically ask for a more voluptuous appearance that transitions the butt into fuller hips. However, these non-invasive BBL results are entirely up to the individual, and can be discussed during the consultation process. The procedure for getting a non-surgical butt lift is fully customizable.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Can you work out or be active during the BBL Recovery?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Yes! One of the benefits of a non-surgical butt lift is the reduced downtime after your cosmetic procedure. We just ask that you avoid working out for 24 hours after your final BBL injections. After those initial 24 hours patients can resume normal activity.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: What is the difference between hyperdilute Radiesse vs. Sculptra®?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Hyperdilute Radiesse is the gold standard for a non-surgical BBL because Radiesse® is both a filler and a biostimulator when used as a butt lift alternative to implants. Radiesse also produces softer collagen that mimics the natural tissue of the buttocks more so than when Sculptra is used for butt lifts, which creates a firmer and more scar-like type of collagen that can lead to lumps. In addition, some patients will hyperpigment when injected with large amounts of Sculptra since Sculptra BBL results produce collagen via inflammation. Hyperdilute Radiesse side effects do not include hyperpigmentation or inflammation.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Why does Lushful Aesthetics use hyperdilute Radiesse?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"One of our NYC MedSpa’s goals is to provide safe and effective outcomes for our patients, and the Hyperdilute Radiesse BBL has helped to provide safe results for happy patients. Hyperdilute Radiesse filler provides non-surgical BBL results that are twofold: 1, you get instant results after the non-invasive butt lift procedure is completed, with little to no downtime, and secondly, you have long-term results via collagen induction. Collagen helps to keep that BBL look for years by helping your body produce healthy skin cells to maximize the bounce to your booty. Hyperdilute Radiesse creates a soft collagen that feels like real tissue in the buttocks and also induces elastin production so it helps to keep skin tight. This makes hyperdilute Radiesse the gold standard for the non-surgical BBL.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Is the Lushful Instant BBL the same as a Botox Bum Lift?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"No, the Lushful Instant BBL is a procedure that uses filler to increase the volume of the buttocks. Botox is a neurotoxin that relaxes muscles in the face and other parts of the body. Botox can’t be used to lift the Butt, unlike hydilute radiesse filler, which is used to create a butt lift without implants. At our practice, we offer HoleTox®, which is the use of Botox to relax the anal sphincter. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

metaDescription: Enhance curves with a non-surgical BBL in NYC. Our liquid Brazilian butt lift restores volume, corrects deflated BBLs, and delivers natural results.
metaTitle: Non-Surgical BBL NYC | Liquid Brazilian Butt Lift

@graph.name: Lushful Instant BBL
@graph.description: A non-invasive buttocks enhancement procedure utilizing hyperdilute Radiesse injections to provide immediate volume, improve symmetry, and enhance the S-shaped curve of the buttocks. This treatment addresses concerns such as asymmetry, cellulite, and hip dips, offering a natural appearance without the need for implants.
@graph.howPerformed: Hyperdilute Radiesse, a biostimulatory dermal filler, is injected into the buttocks to provide immediate volume and stimulate collagen production. The procedure is performed with minimal downtime and no scarring.
@graph.followup: Patients may experience mild swelling or soreness for 3–7 days post-treatment. Final results typically settle within 2–4 weeks. Sun exposure should be avoided during the initial healing period.

faqRef.question: Is laser hair removal an option for people with darker complexions?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"At Lushful Aesthetics, a quality NYC med spa, we chose our laser because it is a dual laser and the gold standard for treating darker skin tones effectively, efficiently, and safely. Many other lasers are not suitable for treating patients with darker complexions as there is a risk of hyperpigmentation.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How long does laser hair removal last? Will hair grow back after?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The results of laser hair removal permanently destroy your hair follicles, meaning you will not grow these particular hairs again. This does NOT mean that new ones won’t grow. So it's possible—especially after a few months—that you'll notice new hairs growing in your treated areas, even if they aren't the same as the ones that have been removed. Many factors, including age, gender, hormone levels, and metabolism will affect your body's ability to create new hair follicles. Most patients who want to maintain a smooth appearance will go on a maintenance plan that usually consists of a laser session every few months as opposed to every few weeks. Otherwise, most patients see very little hair regrowth and many think it’s fine as is.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We recommend buzzing 2-3 inches below the butt with a trimmer at a medium length to create a fade. You may need to experiment to find the best length for your aesthetic.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

Your provider can customize the shape and style of your pubic hair however you’d like. Regardless of your aesthetic preferences, just let us know and we’ll customize your laser hair removal treatment to your preference.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: I’ve had laser hair removal before, but it didn’t work. Is your service any different?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Several laser hair removal devices have become more efficient over time. Unfortunately, hair removal lasers are expensive and many other providers have decided not to upgrade their technology. We still sometimes hear about some places using IPL machines, which are not designed for laser hair removal. Here at Lushful Aesthetics, we utilize the Cynosure EliteIQ, which is the gold standard for laser hair removal. This means we can fully customize the settings to your skin and hair type to deliver the best results possible.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How should I prepare for my laser hair removal session?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Sun exposure and antibiotics should be avoided for 2 weeks before receiving laser hair removal. Skin that is exposed to the sun is more sensitive to the laser. Tanned skin is also more difficult to treat when it comes to seeing results. Therefore, we ask med spa patients to try to be at their baseline skin color. Patients must be off Accutane for at least one year before being treated. Patients should ideally shave 1-3 days before their appointment. Same-day shaving is not recommended as the skin is more irritated and it’s harder for the laser to find the hair follicle to treat. Waxing, sugaring, and chemical hair removal (like Nair) should be discontinued at least a month before laser hair removal treatment.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How is laser hair removal for men different than laser hair removal for women?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Men have more active testosterone than women, especially younger men. Testosterone plays a major role in creating new hair follicles. This makes laser hair removal for men a longer process that requires more sessions than you’d see with a female patient. Men should also expect to maintain their results with 3-4 treatments a year once they reach their desired outcome. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Does laser hair removal hurt?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Laser hair removal feels like a rubber band snap on the skin – although each patient’s comfort level is different. We use a medical laser that is highly effective, extremely adjustable, and designed for hair removal to make the experience comfortable for our patients while delivering great results. Depending on the areas treated, we often adjust the settings throughout the treatment for more sensitive areas. We offer the latest in laser technology, which incorporates an industry-leading cooling technology to improve comfort. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How many sessions of laser hair removal do I need?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Each patient is unique. Various factors affect hair reduction, including the amount of hair at baseline, the color of the hair and skin tone, and the patient’s pain tolerance. Patients undergoing hormone replacement for testosterone will also have greater difficulty with hair reduction and will require more sessions to achieve their goals. The patients who see the best and fastest results have dark hair and lighter skin, as the laser setting can be safely set at a higher setting. That being said, our laser is equipped to treat all skin tones, and all of our patients have been satisfied with their laser results.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How many laser hair removal sessions on average will get the optimum results?

answer.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We sell our laser hair removal packages in sets of 6. Most patients see amazing results in 8-12 sessions. It varies dramatically depending on the patient's baseline hair density, skin tone, hair color, and pain tolerance.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

faqRef.question: Are there people who don’t qualify for laser hair removal?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Unfortunately, people with white, grey, light blonde, and light red hair, won’t see results from laser hair removal. The laser targets pigment in the hair follicle and these tones lack pigment.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

@graph.name: Laser Hair Removal
@graph.description: A medical procedure that uses light energy absorbed by the hair's pigment cells to heat the hair follicle and decrease hair growth. This treatment targets various body areas, including underarms, buttocks, chest, abdomen, back, and legs, offering long-lasting hair reduction.
@graph.howPerformed: A dual-wavelength laser system (YAG/Alexandrite) is used to target pigment in the hair follicles, generating heat that damages the follicles and inhibits future hair growth. The procedure is performed in sessions tailored to the patient's skin type, hair color, and treatment area.
@graph.followup: Patients typically require 8–12 sessions, spaced 4–8 weeks apart, to achieve significant hair reduction. Maintenance sessions may be needed periodically. Post-treatment care includes avoiding sun exposure and applying SPF to treated areas.

@graph.name: Botox for Hyperhidrosis
@graph.description: Botox injections into the underarm eccrine glands to reduce or eliminate excessive underarm sweating (axillary hyperhidrosis); results typically last around 3–4 months.
@graph.howPerformed: Botox is injected into the underarm area using a multi-needle device under optional numbing or ProNox (laughing gas) for comfort.
@graph.preparation: Avoid alcohol for 3 days prior and discontinue blood-thinning medications such as Ibuprofen, Excedrin, Aspirin, Aleve, and Fish Oil about one week before treatment.
@graph.followup: Results develop over approximately 2 weeks and last around 3–4 months on average; patients may return for repeat treatments as needed.

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Our intimate bleaching and chemical peels help suppress the action of melanocytes, thus lowering the amount of melanin produced (pigment). Pigmentation varies by person, but friction in the anal area and other environmental and hormonal factors can increase pigmentation. By utilizing a customized brightening cream in intimate areas, we can tailor your anal lightening experience to deliver optimal results that you will love. In addition, we provide those who receive our men's aesthetic clinic services with all the education on post-treatment care to know how to maintain your anal bleaching results at home over time.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

@graph.description: ShowTox is a non-surgical treatment involving botulinum toxin injections into the penis to reduce sensitivity and help manage premature ejaculation, enhancing sexual performance and confidence.
@graph.howPerformed: Botulinum toxin is injected into specific areas of the penis using fine needles under topical anesthesia and ProNox (laughing gas) for patient comfort. The procedure typically takes 15-20 minutes.
@graph.followup: Patients may experience mild swelling or bruising at injection sites for a few days. Sexual activity should be avoided for 3-5 days post-procedure. Results typically last 3-4 months.

faqRef.question: What is the difference between Focused Shockwave Therapy and Acoustic Shockwave Therapy?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The term “shockwave” is unfortunately unregulated in the United States. Therefore there are terms such as “acoustic shockwave therapy” and “radial shockwave therapy” that are being utilized, which are simply inaccurate. Acoustic energy and radial pressure are NOT shockwaves. They do not create the energy required to be labeled as shockwaves, and thus do not appropriately penetrate the tissue at the accurate depth to make any medical impact. Prospective patients looking for a potential treatment for ED should avoid clinics offering  “Acoustic Shockwave Therapy” and “Radial Shockwave Therapy”. Focused Shockwave Therapy is the only current treatment modality studied for treating erectile dysfunction.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

Multiple treatment sessions for penis rejuvenation therapy are required and patients should see an improvement a week after each treatment.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: What is the P-Shot and HD PRP?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The P-Shot® is simply injecting the penis with Platelet Rich Plasma (PRP), which is derived from your own blood and centrifuged to concentrate the growth factors and stem cells. We utilize the Emcyte PRP system, which is the gold standard centrifuge for concentrating stem cells to produce HD PRP. @graph.name: P-Shot®
@graph.description: The P-Shot® is a non-surgical male enhancement treatment that utilizes Platelet-Rich Plasma (PRP) derived from your own blood to rejuvenate and enhance sexual performance. This natural injectable solution is ideal for men experiencing erectile dysfunction, decreased sensitivity, or performance issues.
@graph.howPerformed: A blood sample is drawn from the patient, processed to concentrate the PRP, and then injected into specific areas of the penis. The procedure typically takes about one hour and is performed under local anesthesia with the option of ProNox (laughing gas) for added comfort.
@graph.followup: Patients may experience mild swelling, bruising, or tenderness at the injection sites, which typically resolve within a few days. It is recommended to avoid sexual activity for 1–2 weeks post-treatment.

intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Aesthetic clinic patients receive HoleTox, otherwise known as anal botox, to make receiving anal sex (bottoming) easier. @graph.name: HoleTox®
@graph.description: HoleTox® is a non-surgical aesthetic treatment involving the injection of botulinum toxin into the internal and external anal sphincter muscles to relax them, making penetrative anal sex (bottoming) easier and more comfortable. It also aids in the prevention and treatment of anal fissures and hemorrhoids.
@graph.howPerformed: Botulinum toxin is injected into the anal sphincter muscles using fine needles. The procedure takes approximately 3 minutes and is performed under local anesthesia with ProNox (laughing gas) to ensure patient comfort.
@graph.followup: Patients may experience mild bruising and swelling at the injection sites, which typically resolve within a few days. It is recommended to avoid strenuous activities for 24 hours post-treatment and refrain from penetrative anal sex for at least 3 days.

@graph.name: HangTox

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Like facial Botox treatments, the side effects for this treatment are pretty rare. The most common include swelling, redness, and bruising. All of these side effects resolve fairly quickly and are easily concealed by clothing. The area is over treated then patients can experience structural weakness for a few weeks. This is why it’s important to choose a men’s med spa that understands how to dose and treat structural muscles. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How long does trapezius Botox last?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Just like Botox treated in other areas, trap Botox lasts 3-4 months. However, patients may not need to be treated every 3-4 months because the trapezius is a structural muscle. Meaning, we’re not treating this muscle because of “wrinkles”, we are trying to debulk the muscle to relieve tension. So if the tension is gone, then patients should just return when they feel the tension returning. Over treating this muscle too often over time can lead to structural weakness. That being said, some individuals have severe hypertrophic or enlarged trapezius muscles that require ongoing treatment in order for them to continue to experience relief. But this is not the norm. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Is trapezius Botox painful?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Trap Botox is extremely quick and most patients find it actually to feel “good” because the very small needle is breaking up the muscle tension like acupuncture. Typically there’s 3 injection points per side and then the procedure is over. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Is there any downtime with the Trap Botox procedure? Can I return to work immediately?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We just ask that patients avoid exercise, saunas, hot tubs, etc for 24 hours. After that patients can completely resume normal activity. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\n\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Is TrapTox recommended for athletes or individuals with active lifestyles?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"TrapTox can be for anyone looking for relief of overly tense trapezius muscles. For athletes it’ll just be important to gage whether they heavily rely on these muscles to compete in their sport of choice. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Can Trap Botox treat shoulder tension related to desk jobs or prolonged device usage?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Yes! This is actually why we’re seeing a huge rise in TrapTox being performed. Many of us are slouching and hunching over all day which leads to excessive tension being built up in the trapezius muscles, which also leads to over enlargement of these muscles. TrapTox is the perfect med spa solution for this.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

@graph.name: TrapTox
@graph.description: TrapTox is a non-surgical aesthetic treatment involving the injection of botulinum toxin into the trapezius muscles to alleviate muscle tension, reduce shoulder pain, and create a more defined neck and shoulder contour.
@graph.howPerformed: Botulinum toxin is injected into the trapezius muscles to temporarily relax the muscle, reducing tension and bulkiness. This procedure is performed using fine needles to minimize discomfort.
@graph.followup: Patients may experience mild swelling, redness, or bruising at the injection sites, which typically resolve within a few days. It's advisable to avoid strenuous activities for 24 hours post-treatment.

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Laser resurfacing treatments for body and butt acne scars work by utilizing both an ablative and non-ablative dual laser. faqSchema.name: Laser Resurfacing for Body & Butt
faqSchema.description: A non-invasive aesthetic treatment utilizing dual-wavelength laser technology to rejuvenate and resurface the skin on various body areas, including the abdomen, buttocks, chest, shoulders, arms, and back. This procedure addresses concerns such as acne scars, pigmentation issues, sun damage, and skin texture irregularities.
faqSchema.howPerformed: The Alma Hybrid laser system combines a 10600 nm CO2 ablative laser and a 1570 nm non-ablative erbium laser to target both the surface and deeper layers of the skin. The ablative laser removes damaged skin layers, while the non-ablative laser stimulates collagen production, promoting skin tightening and texture improvement.
preparation: Avoid wearing makeup or spray tan on the treatment area on the day of the procedure.
Discontinue the use of retinol and other active ingredients at least one week prior to treatment.
Ensure that the treatment area has no active sun tans or heavy direct sun exposure before the procedure.
faqSchema.followup: Post-treatment care includes applying exosomes to enhance healing and undergoing red LED light therapy to reduce inflammation and stimulate collagen induction. Patients may experience dryness and flakiness for up to two weeks and should avoid sun exposure during this period. Proper moisturizing and the use of sunscreen are essential for optimal recovery.

Pixel-8 RF Microneedling also is one of the gold standards for treating acne scars, skin texture, improving the appearance of pores, and helping the appearance of cellulite. The aesthetic clinic results of the RF Microneedling procedure help to significantly improve skin texture. When targeting acne scars and skin texture, it’s best to initially combine Pixel-8 RF Microneedling with our signature laser facial to optimize skin rejuvenation. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

faqRef.question: Is this Morpheus8?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"No, although the Pixel-8 RF Microneedling device is similar to Morpheus8 and utilizes the same radiofrequency microneedling technology, this RF Microneedling procedure is far superior to Morpheus, from the recovery of Morpheus 8 before and after to the Morpheus 8 results, Pixel-8 offers more versatility and control when it comes to the clients desired results. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Why is Pixel-8 better than Morpheus8?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Both Pixel-8 Radiofrequency Microneedling and Morpheus8 utilize heat transmitted through tiny needles to treat acne scars, tighten skin, remodel fat tissue and improve skin texture, but the Pixel-8 treatment has more features to control the energy delivered and these RF Microneedling side effects are less painful. This allows for more precise treatments and because the treatment itself is far more comfortable, it means the patient will receive a more thorough treatment. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Why is RF Microneedling better than traditional Microneedling?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"RF Microneedling utilizes bi-polar radiofrequency energy transmitted through tiny needles on a microneedling tip. This allows for far superior collagen induction and remodeling, making RF Microneedling have benefits for acne scars, skin tightening, fat remodeling, skin texture improvement, and more! Unlike other treatment methods, such as the Morpheus 8 treatment, Pixel-8 RF Microneedling offers more precision and less pain. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Does RF Microneedling help with scars?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Yes, RF Microneedling is one of the gold standard treatments for treating acne scars at medical spas. The penetration of the needles and the amount of energy delivered is fully customized with the Pixel-8 Radiofrequency Microneedling device to yield optimal results. When using the Microneedling RF treatment for acne scars, it’s best to combine Pixel-8 Radiofrequency Microneedling with laser resurfacing.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Does RF Microneedling resurface skin?

answer.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No, contrary to popular belief, RF microneedling is NOT a laser. It has no “resurfacing” properties. Patients looking to resurface their skin should consider laser skin rejuvenation. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

faqRef.question: Does RF Microneedling tighten skin?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Yes, to a degree the RF microneedling procedure can tighten skin. RF Microneedling utilizes energy delivered through tiny needles to stimulate collagen and elastin induction that helps skin to appear tighter and less crepey. That being said, it is NOT a replacement for a facelift in patients with significant skin laxity. Patients who can best benefit from RF Microneedling’s “tightening” capabilities are typically in their late 20’s to early 40’s. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Does RF Microneedling remodel fat?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Yes, it can. When utilizing enough energy and the appropriate depth of penetration, Pixel-8 Radiofrequency Microneedling can shrink fat pads to give patients a more sculpted and contoured appearance. That being said, not all patients would benefit from fat remodeling and that’s why the Pixel-8 Radiofrequency Microneedling device is fully customizable to adjust the energy levels and depth of penetration to focus on the patient's precise goals, a feature other treatments, such as the Morpheus 8 results, doesn’t have the same level of predictability and precision.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\n\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Is RF Microneedling better than Fraxel?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Fraxel and Pixel-8 Radiofrequency Microneedling are completely different types of treatments. The Fraxel Restore Dual laser utilizes two wavelengths, the 1550 nanometers (nm) and 1927 nm. This is meant to resurface the skin, while Microneedling RF treatment works to remodel and induce collagen and elastin production to address acne scars, skin texture, remodel fat pads, and promote skin tightening. If a patient is looking to explore a Fraxel treatment then they should consider a laser resurfacing treatment with the Alma Hybrid instead, as the technology is far superior to Fraxel. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Is RF Microneedling better than Botox?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"RF microneeding is a med spa treatment that is targeting different concerns than Botox. Botox is targeting muscles so they can relax, thus limiting muscle mobility which reduces fine lines and wrinkles. While Microneedling RF benefits focuses on skin texture, fat remodeling, and skin tightening. These two modalities are quite amazing when utilized together because you’re treating different aspects of aging.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Is RF Microneedling better than laser resurfacing?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Laser resurfacing can target similar concerns as RF Microneedling such as skin texture and skin tightness, but lasers work through very different mechanisms. It’s best to combine laser resurfacing and RF Microneedling together in order to achieve optimal results. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Is RF Microneedling better than HALO laser?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"HALO laser utilizes 1470 nm wavelength for coagulation (column of heat) and a 2940 nm wavelength for ablation (to vaporize). This is a completely different type of treatment than RF Microneedling, but can be utilized in conjunction with a RF Microneedling procedure for optimal results. However, the results from the Alma Hybrid are far superior to the HALO laser due to its unique 1550 nm wavelength and combined CO2 properties. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Is RF Microneedling better than IPL or BBL?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"BBL, which stands for Broadband Light Therapy, is essentially the newest version of IPL, which stands for Intense Pulsed Light Therapy. These treatments are quite imprecise and are NOT laser treatments. They can treat small concerns such as sun spots over many treatments. This is completely different from RF Microneedling, as these light therapies do not induce collagen or elastin production and don’t address skin texture or skin tightening. When considering addressing skin concerns such as broken capillaries, skin tightening, sun damage, pigmentation, fine lines and wrinkles, then patients should receive a Laser Facial treatment with the Alma Hybrid and Alma Veil. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Can RF Microneedling be done in the Summer?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Yes. Because RF Microneedling isn’t a laser it doesn’t leave the skin as sensitive to the sun. Therefore just daily SPF usage is enough to protect your skin post-treatment. Whereas with laser treatments, sun must be avoided typically anywhere from 3 days to 2+ weeks. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Are RF Microneedling side effects painful?

answer.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Prior to being treated the patient is numbed with prescription numbing cream and is also provided laughing gas during the treatment to ease anxiety and feel relaxed. Compared to the Morpheus 8 treatment and recovery, Pixel-8 RF Microneedling is a more comfortable recovery.  Between the topical numbing and the laughing gas, patients are very comfortable during their treatment. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

faqRef.question: How many treatments of RF Microneedling do I need?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"This varies entirely on why the patient is seeking treatment with RF Microneedling. For treating active concerns such as acne scars, skin tightening, and fat remodeling patients should expect 3+ treatments. When patients are receiving RF Microneedling just to induce collagen and elastin as a preventative treatment, it should be done ideally 4 times per year. At our NYC medspa for men, we tailor RF Microneedling plans to each client's needs, whether for active treatment or preventative care.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Do I need to discontinue retinol or other active topical ingredients prior to perceiving RF Microneedling?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We recommend discontinuing retinol and other active skincare products a week prior to your Microneedling RF treatment, but it’s not a necessity. Many patients will utilize retinol right up to their treatment and this helps with further collagen induction. It just may cause some more additional skin sensitivity, but that is easily managed with proper post-care. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Is RF Microneedling safe on darker skin tones?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Yes! Because RF Microneedling is not an ablative laser treatment it is safe on all skin tones and types, and the results of RF Microneedling equally as beneficial on darker skin tones. Including deeper skin tones that are prone to post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

@graph.name: RF Microneedling
@graph.description: A minimally invasive treatment combining microneedling and radiofrequency energy to stimulate collagen production, improve texture, reduce fine lines, and tighten skin.
@graph.howPerformed: Microneedles penetrate the skin to deliver radiofrequency energy to the dermis, promoting collagen remodeling and skin tightening. The procedure is typically performed with topical anesthesia (and optional analgesia).
@graph.followup: Mild redness and swelling can occur and usually resolve within a few days. Results improve over several weeks as collagen remodels.

faqRef.question: What devices are utilized for CO2 laser therapy?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Here at Lushful Aesthetics we only utilize the industry-leading standard lasers for resurfacing, which is the Alma Hybrid. The Alma Hybrid Laser utilizes two wavelengths, the 1570 nm wavelength that stimulates both collagen and elastic fibers without any damage to the top layer of skin, and a CO2 laser for resurfacing. The Alma Hybrid can utilize these two wavelengths independently or together for a synergistic effect. The entire treatment is fully customizable and can be even further customized to treat various parts of the face differently. \n","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How does this compare to HALO laser treatment?

Its unique 1570 nm wavelength and CO2 laser therapy combination allows for full customization of your treatment. In addition, the 1570 nm is unique to the Alma Hybrid. It’s the best wavelength to stimulate elastin, which is a key component in making skin appear youthful, especially when combined with CO2 laser rejuvenation. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How does this compare to Fraxel?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Fraxel is an outdated laser resurfacing technology. The Alma Hybrid is the top choice in both non-ablative and ablative laser resurfacing treatments. With its unique combination of a 1570 nm wavelength and a CO2 component, it’s able to create endless combinations of unique patterns to combine or separate both wavelengths to create a fully customized experience.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: How is this different from a traditional CO2 device?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The Alma Hybrid is not just a CO2 device, it also contains a non-ablative 1570 nm wavelength that allows for a different depth of collagen and elastin production. Traditional CO2 laser therapy devices only help to produce collagen and not elastin. Elastin is what allows the skin to still look like skin, giving it that youthful bounce and suppleness. @graph.name: RevitalBrite Laser Resurfacing
@graph.description: A dual-modality laser resurfacing treatment combining CO2 ablative and 1570 nm non-ablative erbium lasers to address acne scars, pigmentation, fine lines, and skin texture.
@graph.howPerformed: The Alma Hybrid Laser combines CO2 ablative and 1570 nm non-ablative erbium wavelengths to resurface skin. Treatments are followed with BENEV Exosomes and Red LED Light Therapy to accelerate healing and results.
@graph.followup: Mild redness and swelling may occur after treatment but typically resolve within hours to days. Final results improve as skin remodels in the following weeks.

@graph.name: Multi-Restore Energy Treatment
@graph.description: A multi-modality facial rejuvenation protocol combining fractional CO2, 1570 nm non-ablative resurfacing, RF microneedling, and LED therapy to improve texture, tone, laxity, and pigmentation.

pricingHeading: Cost of Reve Enlighten (Facial Chemical Peel) System
subheadingTwo: How Do Reve Enlighten Face Peels at Lushful Aesthetics Work?

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The Reve Enlighten Chemical Peel system utilizes a solution of actives (mainly acids) to induce a controlled injury to the outermost layers of the skin. The body removes the damaged skin via “peeling,” and the new skin that is revealed underneath has improved texture and more even pigment. Reve Enlighten chemical peels also work beautifully to improve acne/blemishes by increasing the cell turnover rate of the skin and may help to reduce acne scars. Depending on the concern being targeted, as well as the area being treated, multiple sessions may be required for optimal results if you want to utilize facial chemical peels for hyperpigmentation or dark spots. Patients of our men’s aesthetic clinic who receive this service are provided with medical-grade skincare for both before and after the chemical peel treatments to optimize and maintain their results.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

faqRef.question: Do chemical peels for your face hurt?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"This varies depending on the chemical peel itself and the patient's pain tolerance. The Reve Peel Fresh and Reve Peel Enlighten Plus are not particularly \"spicy\". However, the Reve Peel Classic is a  strong chemical peel that will address several skin conditions. This peel can be more intense for many. We utilize a medical grade cooling device to help with the initial stinging sensation. Once the peel has dried, the stinging sensation is very mild and tolerable. It will remain like this until it is washed off. Upon washing the peel off the skin will feel like you experienced a sunburn. Utilizing the post-care medical grade skincare provided will help soothe your skin and improve your results from the peel. subheadingTwo: How Do Chemical Face Peels at Lushful Aesthetics Work?

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"A chemical peel utilizes a solution of actives (mainly acids) to induce a controlled injury to the outermost layers of the skin. The body removes the damaged skin via “peeling,” and the new skin that is revealed underneath has improved texture and more even pigment. Facial chemical peels also work beautifully to improve acne/blemishes by increasing the cell turnover rate of the skin and may help to reduce acne scars. Depending on the concern being targeted, as well as the area being treated, multiple sessions may be required for optimal results if you want to utilize facial chemical peels for hyperpigmentation or dark spots. Patients of our men’s aesthetic clinic who receive this service are provided with medical-grade skincare to optimize and maintain their results.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

preCare.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Do not wear makeup to your appointment at our NYC Aesthetic Clinic. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Avoid shaving, waxing, or chemical hair removal for at least 48 hours prior to your chemical face peel appointment. ​","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"If you’re prone to cold sores, begin taking your medication at least 3 days prior to your appointment.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Patients should expect to be red for 24 hours. The next day your skin will feel extremely dry and may present as darker. The skin will continue to dry up and darken. Around day 3 the skin will begin to peel off in a sheet. It is crucial to NOT pick at the peeling skin. It must be left alone or cut off with a scissor very carefully. The skin will continue to peel for a total of 7 days. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No exfoliating your skin physically or chemically for 2 weeks. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Daily sunscreen is mandatory for 2 weeks.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

faqRef.question: Do chemical peels hurt?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"This varies depending on the chemical peel itself and the patient's pain tolerance. The Reve Peel Fresh and Reve Peel Enlighten Plus are not particularly \"spicy\". However, the Reve Peel Classic is a  strong chemical peel that will address several skin conditions. This peel can be more intense for many. We utilize a medical grade cooling device to help with the initial stinging sensation. Once the peel has dried, the stinging sensation is very mild and tolerable. It will remain like this until it is washed off. Upon washing the peel off the skin will feel like you experienced a sunburn. Utilizing the post-care medical grade skincare provided will help soothe your skin and improve your results from the peel. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

Once the patient has stopped peeling they can fully appreciate their results, such as reduced acne scars, from the chemical peel.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: What’s the downtime?

SPF 50+ should be utilized following the chemical peel for at least two weeks to ensure proper protection.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Are facial chemical peels safe to do during the Summer?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"It depends. Chemical peels can be safe to do in the Summer if the patient is completely out of the sun during the week-long recovery period. They must also have very limited sun exposure during the second week of treatment, along with appropriate sun protection (SPF 50+). Many patients find this challenging during the Summer months, but if they do want to proceed with a chemical peel it is possible with the appropriate safety parameters in place.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqRef.question: Chemical peel vs. laser resurfacing, what is the difference?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The difference between chemical peels and laser resurfacing is that chemical peels utilize acids to resurface the skin, stimulate collagen production and lift up pigmentation and texture issues. While laser resurfacing utilizes specific wavelengths of energy to target various specific concerns within the skin. Both modalities are highly effective and depending on your skin concern and skin type, one may be more effective than the other. That being said, oftentimes patients with complex acne scarring, significant texture, or prominent deep set wrinkles and fine lines will require a combination of chemical peels, microneedling + exosomes, and laser resurfacing to receive optimal correction. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

metaDescription: Discover the art of facial harmonization at Lushful Aesthetics. Using strategic filler placements, we emphasize your best features for a refreshed, natural look.
metaTitle: Facial Balancing - Nonsurgical Facial Harmonization in NYC

@graph.name: Facial Balancing
@graph.description: A non-surgical treatment that utilizes strategically placed dermal fillers to enhance facial symmetry and harmony, addressing multiple areas of the face for a balanced and youthful appearance.
@graph.howPerformed: Hyaluronic acid-based fillers and Radiesse® are injected into various facial areas, including the forehead, temples, under-eyes, cheeks, jawline, and chin, to restore volume, correct asymmetry, and rejuvenate the overall facial appearance.
@graph.preparation: Avoid alcohol consumption for 3 days before receiving facial balancing fillers. Consult with your medical provider about discontinuing blood-thinning medications such as Ibuprofen, Excedrin, Aspirin, Aleve, and Fish Oil. Do not wear makeup to your appointment.
@graph.followup: Results are visible immediately and settle over 2–4 weeks; mild swelling or tenderness is common and typically resolves naturally. Full settling may take up to 4 weeks.

faqRef.question: What are the potential side effects of under eye filler?
